articles.author: Erin Jensen, USA TODAY
articles.title: 'AGT: All-Stars': Ukrainian Light Balance Kids receive Golden Buzzer - USA TODAY
articles.description: Good just isn't good enough on "America's Got Talent: All-Stars." NBC's super-competition pitting the best against the best premiered Monday.
articles.content:
Good just isn't good enough on "America's Got Talent: All-Stars."
